rukus.text: 68|34|Niscaya muttakbisakalara babe te'omlokara pratipalakara ocarata ache niyamatapurna jannata.
68|35|Ami muchalima (anugata)sakalaka aparaadhisakalara darae ganya karaima neki
68|36|tomalokara ki haiche, tomaloke e'ito kenekuraa sid'dhanta karaa
68|37|tomalokara ocarata kono puthi ache neki ya’ta tomaloke adhyayana karaa
68|38|ye, niscaya tomalokara babe tata enekuraa bastu ache yi tomaloke pachanda karaa
68|39|athaba tomalokara babe amara lagata kiyamata paryanta balabat thaka enekuraa kono angikara ache neki ye, tomaloke nijara babe yitorae phayacala karaiba se'itorae paba
68|40|tumi sihamtaka sodha, sihamtara majata e'i dabira jim'madara kona
68|41|athaba sihamtara babe (allahara lagata) bahuto ansidara ache neki? Ache yadi tente sihamte sihamtara ansidarasakalaka upasthita karaka—yadi sihamta satyabadi haya.
68|42|Se'idina bharaira kalaphuli unmocita karaa ha’ba, se'idina sihamtaka mata ha’ba chajadaha karaibalai, kintu sihamta saksama naha’ba

68|43|sihamtara drstisamuha aranata arasthata thakiba, apamane sihamtaka acchanna karaiba athaca yetiya sihamta niraapada achila tetiya sihamtaka mata haichila chajada karaibalai (kintu sihamte chajada karaa nachila).
68|44|Eteka erai diya moka arau sihamtaka yisakale e'i bani pratyakhyana karae. Ami sihamtaka lahe lahe enekai dharaima ye, sihamte game'i napaba.
68|45|Arau ma'i sihamtaka arakasa dima. Niscaya mora kausala atyanta balistha.
68|46|Tumi sihamtara ocarata paraisramika (binimaya) dabi karaicha neki, yara phalata sihamte rnara karane bharaakraanta hai paraiche
68|47|ne sihamtara ocarata gayebara jnana ache, yito sihamte likhi raakhe
68|48|eteke tumi tomara pratipalakara adesara apeksata dhairya dharana karaa, arau tumi machara garaakira darae naha’ba, yetiya te'om bisada acchanna arasthata ahbana karaichila.
68|49|Yadi te'omra pratipalakara anugraha te'omra ocarata ahi napalehemtena, tente te'om lanchita arasthata unmukta praantarata niksipta ha’lehemtena.
68|50|Tara pichata te'omra pratipalake te'omka manonita karaile arau te'omka satkarmaparaayanasakalara antarbhukta karaile.
68|51|Arau kaphirasakale yetiya upadesabani (kora'ana) sune tetiya sihamte enekuraa drstirae tomara phale caya yeniba tomaka bagaraa'i diba, arau sihamte kaya, ‘niscaya e'om ejana unmada (baliya)’.
68|52|Athaca e'i kora'ana kerala bisbabasira babe upadesa.
